Make a map of N. Am and then bound

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(raster)
library(mapdata)
library(ggrepel)
```

```{r}
map<-map_data("world") %>% filter(region %in% c("USA","Canada","Mexico"))
```

````{r}
ggplot(map) +
  geom_polygon(aes(x=long, y=lat, group=group), fill="grey50") +
  coord_fixed(1.3, xlim = c(-150, -55), ylim=c(20,70)) +
  #theme_bw() +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank()) +
  geom_rect(xmin=-123.5324, xmax=-114.6332, ymin=33.5, ymax=43,color="black", alpha=0) +
  theme(axis.title = element_blank()) +
  theme(axis.text = element_blank()) +
  theme(axis.ticks = element_blank()) +
  theme(panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", fill=NA, linewidth=3))

ggsave("outputs/205/inset.pdf")
```
